CustomField.formula: IF( NewPriceTable__c != null && NewPriceTable__r.CarryOutDate__c >= TODAY() && ISPICKVAL(NewPriceTable__r.Status__c, "Approved"), FALSE, IF ( Account__c != null , IF( Text(PriceTableType__c) = "StorageFee" , Active__c , NOT(Account__r.DeliveryContractTermination__c) && Active__c ) , Active__c ) )
CustomField.label: 有効
